definition: best of the best/collection of the best (of sth)
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: Life is a collection of experiences. Let us be your guide.
sentences.chinese: 生活是繁复体验的集锦，让我们伴您探索。

sentences.english: These are a collection of some of the phrases that piss me off most.
sentences.chinese: 以下是一个最让我冒火的话的小集锦。

sentences.english: A sampler of American short - story writers.
sentences.chinese: 美国短篇小说作家集锦。

sentences.english: If you only require to choose from Haier series, eVery abundancething will be easier.
sentences.chinese: 假如你只想挑选海尔集锦产业商品，就简单多了。

sentences.english: The goal will make it into every Champions League trailer.
sentences.chinese: 这粒绝杀将会入选每次欧冠联赛的集锦。

sentences.english: We'll get a soap opera series on TV that week.
sentences.chinese: 这周末咱们会在电视上看到一集锦肥皂剧。

definition: to beat easily/to gain an easy victory
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
to win by a narrow margin/to barely win/narrow victory
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
an upset (esp. in sports)/unexpected turn of events/to pull off a coup/a breakthrough
to deal the fatal blow (sports, chess etc)/to score the winning point
